subject: Greetings, Please let this not
body:
Greetings, Please let this not sound strange to you because I am not asking you for money, for my only surviving lawyer who would have done this, died early this year. I prayed and got your email address from your country's guest book which I got from my late husband's archive and I wish to visit once more if God will in his infinite mercies grant me.
I want to solicit your assistance in the discharge of my Will. I am Mrs. Sally Mae Traversie, 
from the United States
 and I am aged 68 years suffering from endometrial cancer. Please, I want you to help me create a charitable project with the money that I inherited from my deceased husband Mr. Alfred Earl Traversie who died in a motor accident. I was brought up from a motherless baby's home and was married to my late husband for twenty nine years without a child.
My friends have plundered so much of my wealth since my illness and I cannot live with the agony of entrusting this huge responsibility to any of them anymore, so I sold all my inherited belongings and deposited all the sum of 9,000,000.00 USD (Nine Million United States Dollars) with my bank. All I need is an honest person who will use at least %60 of the funds as I would instruct, then the rest %40 will go to you for helping me accomplish this mission because donating this money to charity is the only legacy I can leave behind after my death. No money is required from you to carry on with this project because it is my heart's desire to make a generous gift to you to work for a charity in your country. I don't mind if you are a Christian or Muslim or Hindu or Buddhist. Rather, my only paramount concern here is whether I can trust you because this generation is filled up with greedy and fraudulent people all over the world. I will give you more details as soon as I hear from you.
Looking forward to your urgent response.
Kind regards.
Mrs. Sally Mae Traversie

subject: Re: Greetings, Please let this not
body:
Hello Mrs. Sally Mae Traversie,

I'm deeply moved by your story and I'm sorry to hear about your current health condition. It's admirable that you want to leave a legacy through charity, and it's unfortunate that you've had such experiences with people around you.

You mentioned a charitable project that you'd like me to assist with. Could you please provide more details about this project? What kind of charity are we talking about here? Is there a specific cause or group of people that you're particularly interested in helping?

Also, I would like to know more about how the funds will be transferred and managed. You mentioned that no money is required from me, which is good because I don't have much to spare. But I'm curious as to how this process will work.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Henry

subject: Re: Greetings, Please let this not
body:
Good day, how are you doing today and I hope this email finds you well. Thank you for your reply, i am sorry for the late response from me and it was because my doctor asked me not to stress my body due to my health. I want you to send me your name, home address and phone number so that I can send an application letter to the bank along with your information for them to commence with the transfer. You don't have to worry about the authenticity of this project, you can inform your lawyer to guide you through the transfer process without any fear of breaking the law. I have instructed the bank manager and they will work with you and your lawyer to make sure that the transfer is completed according to the laws,  and also for the purpose of the funds. I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Yours Faithfully,
Mrs. Sally Mae Traversie

subject: Re: Greetings, Please let this not
body:
Hello Mrs. Sally Mae Traversie,

I hope this message finds you in good health. I'm sorry to hear about your recent health issues and I hope you're feeling better now.

Regarding the information you asked for, I'm afraid I can't provide my personal details over email due to security reasons. However, I'd be more than happy to assist with the transfer process in any other way that doesn't involve sharing my personal information.

Could you please provide me with more details about the bank and the transfer process? Also, could you clarify what exactly is the purpose of these funds?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Henry

subject: Re: Greetings, Please let this not
body:
Thank you for the reply, first of all the funds is for charity purpose and the bank details is stated below;

Name of Bank: Cooperate First Bank
Bank Email Address: info@copfb.com
Bank's Websites: copfb.com/us
Phone: +1 (305) 851-2831

 You can contact the bank with the information above and also be expecting message or call from the bank through the same above-mentioned information.

Yours Faithfully,
Mrs. Sally Mae Traversie

subject: Re: Greetings, Please let this not
body:
Hello Mrs. Sally Mae Traversie,

Thank you so much for your response and the noble cause you're working towards. It's really heartwarming to see people like you dedicating their efforts towards charity.

I'm a bit confused about the bank details though, could you please clarify? Also, I'd love to know more about this charity. What is its mission? How long has it been in operation?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Henry

subject: Re: Greetings, Please let this not
body:
Good day Henry, how are you doing today. Please what about the bank do you find confusing, and I want to know if you have spoken with my Attorney. The purpose of the funds is to build charity homes and facilities across the country, thereby putting smile on the faces of those poor people out there. Presently there is no structure on ground except for the funds and the vision and that means the project is a fresh start, whereby you are expected to complete the project on a plain and transparent platform with legal confirmation and backing. I want you to feel free and be in good communication with my attorney so that he can lead you through the process.

Yours Faithfully,
Mrs. Sally Mae Traversie

subject: Re: Greetings, Please let this not
body:
Hello Mrs. Sally Mae Traversie,

It's a pleasure to hear from you today. I'm doing well, thank you for asking. Your project sounds like a noble cause and it's wonderful to know that there are people like you who are willing to help those in need.

I must admit, I'm not very familiar with how these things work. Could you please explain more about the process? How does your attorney fit into all of this? And what exactly would my role be in this project?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Henry

subject: Re: Greetings, Please let this not
body: My attorney is in charge of all my properties, and he must be aware of the project and change of beneficiary of my funds.

subject: Re: Greetings, Please let this not
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information with me. It's great to hear that you have a professional handling your affairs, it must be very reassuring.

Could you tell me more about the project you mentioned? I'm always interested in learning about new things. Also, what kind of changes are happening with your funds? 

Remember, I'm just curious and not looking for any specific details or personal information. Just a general idea would be great!

Best wishes,
Henry
